tag.name: cfform
tag.help: Builds a form with CFML custom control tags; these provide more functionality than standard HTML form input elements.

parameter.name: action
parameter.help: Name of CFML page to execute when the form is submitted for processing.

parameter.name: method
parameter.help: The method the browser uses to send the form data to the server: - post: Send the data using the HTTP post method, This method sends the data in a separate message to the server. - get: Send the data using the HTTP get method, which puts the form field contents in the URL query string.

parameter.name: onload
parameter.help: JavaScript to execute when the form loads.

parameter.name: onsubmit
parameter.help: JavaScript function to execute after input validation. Use for preprocessing data before form is submitted

parameter.name: scriptsrc
parameter.help: Lets the user control the URL of the script file; useful if you do not keep the file in the /cfide directory.

parameter.name: onreset
parameter.help: JavaScript to execute when the user clicks a reset button.

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Target window or frame passed through to <FORM>.

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: Form CSS class passed through to <FORM>.

parameter.name: passthrough
parameter.help:
Passes arbitrary attribute-value pairs to the HTML code that is generated for the tag. You can use either of the following formats:
passthrough="title=""myTitle""" passthrough='title="mytitle"'
